  • Uses of HomiesTask in lib.homies.framework.scheduler

    Methods in lib.homies.framework.scheduler that return HomiesTask
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    HomiesTask
    SchedulerService.runAsync(Runnable task)
    Runs a task asynchronously (off the main server thread) immediately.
    HomiesTask
    SchedulerService.runLater(Runnable task, long delay)
    Runs a task once after a specified delay on the main server thread.
    HomiesTask
    SchedulerService.runRepeating(Runnable task, long delay, long period)
    Runs a task repeatedly on the main server thread after an initial delay.
    HomiesTask
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder.start()
    Builds and starts the scheduled task.
